locations.name: Home
locations.description:
Player starts off in the living room standing. You need to make it to work before 9:00AM 
You need to head to work now. Will you drive your CAR or GO on the BUS?

locations.name: Bus
locations.description:
You step onto the bus, and as you approach the driver, you notice a friendly smile on their face. The bus driver seems approachable and ready to assist you. 
Do you want to ask the BUS DRIVER for directions to DRW or GO to your SEAT?

locations.name: Seat
locations.description:
You are near the first stop, eyes immediately drawn to the bellcord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. 
Your hand hovers near the BELLCORD, ready to PULL when the moment feels right. 
Or do you stay on the BUS and keep riding towards the next stop?

locations.name: Bus Stop 2
locations.description:
You are near the second stop, eyes immediately drawn to the pull cord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. 
Your hand hovers near the BELLCORD, ready to PULL when the moment feels right. 
Or do you stay on the BUS and keep riding towards the next stop?

locations.name: Bus Stop 3
locations.description:
You are near the third stop, eyes immediately drawn to the pull cord running along the windows. That simple cord represents your exit strategy, your ticket to disembarking at what you hope will be the right stop for work. 
Your hand hovers near the BELLCORD, ready to PULL when the moment feels right. 
Or do you stay on the BUS and keep riding towards the next stop?

locations.name: Wrong Stop
locations.description:
You get off the bus, but you don't know where you are. You certainly are nowhere near DRW. You got off on the wrong stop You wander for a bit until you see familiar buildings. 
DELAYED: by an extra 25 minutes.
HEAD DOWNTOWN

locations.name: Downtown
locations.description:
A bustling Chicago skyline with the Willis Tower, as you rush through busy streets on your first day, hoping to arrive on time. 
 You can ask the PERSON across the street for directions to DRW or stop at a COFFEE SHOP and grab something quick to drink?

locations.name: Coffee Shop
locations.description:
At a cozy coffee shop, a latte sets a positive tone for your first day. 
You decide BUY some COFFEE before stopping into work.

locations.name: Coffee Event Good
locations.description:
You used the last of your money to buy some coffee to help prep you for the day. You ask the barista if they know they way to the DRW Building, and they do! They write some instructions down on your receipt for you to follow, thankfully, you seem to be close by. 
You sip the coffee, and its delicious, setting a positive tone for the day. You get an energy boost and brain blast, as you make your way to the DRW building

locations.name: Coffee Event Bad
locations.description:
You used the last of your money to buy some coffee to help prep you for the day. You ask the barista if they know they way to the DRW Building, and they do! They write some instructions down on your receipt for you to follow, thankfully, you seem to be close by. 
The coffee was nasty, and you dropped the receipt the barista gave you with instructions to the DRW Building. Thankfully you sorta remembered the way to go, but it'll take a biiiiittt longer than expected to find the DRW building.
Delay by 10 minutes

locations.name: Car
locations.description: Inside car. You deciede to hop on the HIGHWAY this time to try to get to work quickly

locations.name: Highway
locations.description:
On the highway. Traffic doesnt seem too bad, but the lane to your right seems to be going a bit faster.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Normal Drive
locations.description:
Suprisingly, the highway seems clear at this part. Your drive is going normally.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Normal Drive 2
locations.description:
Suprisingly, the highway seems clear at this part. Your drive is going normally.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Normal Drive 3
locations.description:
Suprisingly, the highway seems clear at this part. Your drive is going normally.
Time to head into Downtown to find PARKING

locations.name: Construction Event
locations.description:
Construction on the highway delays your commute by 20 minutes on your first day.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Traffic Event
locations.description:
Highway gridlock adds a 10-minute delay to your first day at work.
Will you stay in this CURRENT LANE, or switch to the RIGHT LANE?

locations.name: Accident Event
locations.description:
Accident ahead. Expect a 20-minute delay, likely to make you late. 
But at least you're close to DOWNTOWN and can start to find PARKING soon.

locations.name: Find Parking
locations.description:
There are many options for parking downtown. 
You can park CLOSE by the DRW Building if you have some money. 
There is also free parking FAR away from DRW, and you have to spend around 10 minutes walking back to the building. 
Will you go to the CLOSE parking or FAR parking?

locations.name: Close
locations.description: Parked nearby, but pricey, took all the pocket money you had on you. Walk to first day, hoping it's worth it. HEAD TO DRW

locations.name: Far
locations.description: Free parking far away. Rushing to the office, first-day urgency. HEAD TO DRW

locations.name: DRW
locations.description: You made it to work on time. Hooray!

locations.name: On time
locations.description: Arriving on time at DRW building, relief washes over you. Ready for a promising first day

locations.name: Late
locations.description: Late at DRW building, dread replaces relief on your first day
